name: .XOJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .XOJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a XOJ file in either Xournal (Linux, Windows) or Xournal++ (cross-platform), both of which are available as free downloads. In either program, select File â†’ Open from the program's menu bar to open your XOJ file.
